title: How to Make a Milo Mocha

steps.headline: Place Milo and coffee in the mug.
Add cream/milk and/or sugar if desired.
Top it off with some whipped cream.

text: Boil water. Once boiled, pour into mug. Place Milo and coffee in the mug. Stir. Add cream/milk and/or sugar if desired.  Top it off with some whipped cream.  Finished.
